#labels libupnpx.a
#Build and use libupnpx.a.

== Build libupnpx.a  ==

Open and build the project:
./upnpx/projects/macos/upnpx/upnpx.xcodeproj

For a Debug build, the result is the upnpx static library:
./upnpx/projects/macos/upnpx/build/Debug/libupnpx.a


== Use libupnpx.a in your own project ==

 * Link against libupnpx.a
 * Include the upnpx API header files


Example, my ‘hello world’ iPhone project
